text:
The Javac task now dumps compiler output to stderr. This makes using output
hilighters (such as grc) difficult, because they aren't all smart enough to
hilight stderr and stdout. 

It'd be nice if all output went to StdOut (excluding ant internal errors, which
should go to stderr).
creator: ehughes@texar.com

text:
I don't think Ant's behavior has changed at all.

Which compiler are you using?
creator: bodewig@apache.org
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
No user feedback since Stefan's question. I'm assuming this is OK.
Feel free to reopen if you can give more information.
